name: Productive Forests
description: Satellite Imagery Processing for Machine Learning Based Image Classification

SDGs.evidenceText: Locating perennial tree crops and assisting forest based communities to harvest more efficiently can increasing their economic resilience and improve quality of life, while other alternatives of revenue in tropical forests aren't necessary sustainable nor legal, such logging, animal poaching and mining. .

Food security is concern in forest based communities. By facilitating the access these communities have to harvesting sustainably from the surrounding forests has direct implications to food security and well being.
